revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = LaFonera 2200.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = La Fonera Wireless Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |fandom = LaFonera_2200 |wikidevi = Fonera_FON2200 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = Supported |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Fon Wireless |model = FON2200 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = A |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 10/30/2010 |page_start_origon = https://infodepot.fandom.com/wiki/LaFonera_2200 |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = UVA-FON2200 |icid = 3857A-FON2200 |boardid = 2976282800
|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR2315A; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 4KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 180 <!-- 180 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L6405MC-20G; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 16 |ram1chip = SK hynix;HY57V281620ETP-H; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8201CP; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = IEEE 802.3/3u |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:18:84 |oui = 00:18:84
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = Redboot;;; |stockos = Linux;2.4.32;;
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 7.5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3.3V TTL |jtag = yes,,
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = bootlog |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bg
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = FON_AP,MyPlace |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Delta Networks |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, OpenWrt,
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 02/09/2007 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0016C8SC8 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{see also|Fonera FON2100}}
*"2976282800" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. *"2976282802" is a version with ST 25P64V6P flash chip.
Per the FCC manual, the device uses two SSIDs.. *FON_AP (public) *MyPlace (private)
Notes: :- Linux version 2.4.32 (iurgi@ropero) (gcc version 3.4.6 ::(OpenWrt-2.0)) #8 lun ene 8 12:33:21 UTC 2007 :- Processor id: 00019064 [[MIPS 4KEc]]
==Links of Interest== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/fon/fonera On the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[http://stefans.datenbruch.de/lafonera/ Hacking the ''La Fonera''] * [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=14471 New fonera Model 2200] on '''DD-WRT''' forums *[https://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=38820 ''Flashing the Fonera FON2200 (the easy way)'' on '''DD-WRT''' forums] *[http://www.fosk.it/flashing-fonera-2200-with-dd-wrt-and-2100-too.html Flashing Fonera 2200 with DD-WRT (and 2100, too)] *[http://www.larsen-b.com/Article/262.html Fonera SD Card Hack]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== Supported by dd-wrt as of = fonera build 7438 20070710 :[https://forum.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/LaFonera_Software_Easy_Flashing Install Guide]
Please insert instructions here
